GO

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL UPUserIdentity WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
SECRET = '?sv=2021-12-02&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupyx&se=2023-07-01T05:35:16Z&st=2023-04-30T21:35:16Z&spr=https&sig=%2F63RzuPg6l6ph01au2ITVE5TcyW33w%2FpctqIQhhZS04%3D'
